creditline: Lent by The Wang Xing Lou Collection
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: celadon glazed porcelain vase, footed teardrop body, long cylindrical neck with seven bands and a wide flared rim; has own storage box
medium: Porcelain with a pale-green celadon glaze
text: While not a direct copy, this vase has a shape and color inspired by the Longquan celadons of the Southern Sung (1127-79) and Yuan (1280-1368) dynasties.
title: Celadon Vase with Ringed Neck
